entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MonoAOTCompiler: ensure only the relevant assemblies are in `aot-in` folder #58976
    7.0.0
  • MonoAOTCompiler: fast path "nothing changed" case #58975
  • Garbage Collector High Memory Load value is higher than available memory when running inside a container with cgroup memory limit #58974
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessary linking after `Build`, when publishing from VS #58973
    6.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!replacedInLowering' #58972
  • HTTP/3 without AppContext switch doesn't give descriptive error #58971
  • [API Proposal]: Add Arm64 to ProcessorArchitecture and ImageFileMachine enums #58970
  • Modifying a file and then executing it can fail in on Linux #58964
  • [API Proposal]: System.Collections.Generic.SortedList<TKey, TValue> should have SetByIndex(Int32,TValue) #58962
  • Regression: Dynamic Code with String Interpolation and Field Resolver #58961
  • Incorrect Regex matching in Turkish culture when ignoring case #58958
    6.0.0
  • [mono] Possible GC hole in runtime invoke #58957
    6.0.0
  • Inconsistent Regex matching behavior in InvariantCulture #58956
    6.0.0
  • [fastthis] Delegate performance being eaten up by not passing `this` in dedicated register #58955
  • JIT: Redundant fmov's on arm64 for a simple function #58954
    7.0.0
  • JitDisasm disassembling arm vpop register list incorrectly #58950
    Future
  • Xamarin dll to run in android studio #58949
  • STJ failing ungracefully when attempting to serialize attributes #58947
    7.0.0
  • Add source generator unit tests for invalid JsonExtensionData cases #58945
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale in macOS 12 beta 8 #58944
  • Support JsonExtensionData in source generator fast path #58943
    7.0.0
  • [JIT] Asm difference for F# and C# methods #58941
  • Marshal.AllocHGlobal/FreeHGlobal is ~150x slower in .NET than legacy mono on device (tvOS) #58939
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator name conflicts #58938
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Non-allocating Span based APIs for Hex conversion #58937
  • System.Collections.Generic.Tests.ComparerTests.NullableComparisons test fails on iOS devices #58933
    7.0.0
  • IConfiguration with empty array elements #58930
  • TLS1.3 networking tests are flaky on Windows 11 #58927
  • DOTNET_ vs COMPlus_ env var prefix for creating dumps #58924
    7.0.0
  • AV when running MSBuild on bad invocation of VSD stub #58920
    6.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_GetSetTimes.CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #58916

Closed

  • DateTime.ToLocalTime offset calculation performance #38047
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add IComparable to MemberInfo #58842
    Future
  • Test Failure UnixPingUtilityTests.TimeoutIsRespected in macOS beta 8 #58946
  • Fix ARM32 floating point registers unwinding in PAL #57040
    6.0.0
  • JIT still seems to be hoisting some modified indirs #58877
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: (ptrdiff_t)generation_free_list_space (gen) >= 0 #57956
    6.0.0
  • JIT: pgo test failure in System.Runtime.Tests.dll #58373
    6.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Media.Test.SoundPlayerTests.LoadAsync_CancelDuringLoad_CompletesAsCanceled(cancellationCause: 0) #37140
    Future
  • Compilation.GetTypeByMetadataName does not account for accessibility #57349
    6.0.0
  • Minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58695
    Future
  • System.IO.Pipelines need support targetframework NETStandard 2.1 #58925
  • [mono][loader] Drop MONO_ASMCTX_INTERNAL #37304
    7.0.0
  • Test failure CtorAndAccept_SocketNotKeptAliveViaInheritance #58903
    7.0.0
  • FltToInt: OverflowException in Debug and no exception in Release #58832
    6.0.0
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync cannot quit even if Close() is called. #58713
    Future
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms by avoiding the "-windows" RID #58495
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop\PInvoke\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4\Vector2_3_4.dll #58899
    6.0.0
  • Linq XElement.Add adds text "None" into XML #58890
  • StringBuilder.Insert() overload to insert a character any number of times #58461
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Rename misleading members of TimeSpan #58848
  • API documentation debt - System.Net #43859
    6.0.0
  • CI System.Windows.Extensions.Test failure in "Libraries Test Run release mono Windows_NT x64 Debug" leg #41676
    Future
  • question about jit code on mono interal call cause crash. #58858
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid some null checks in the sgen alloc wrappers. #58968
    area-GC-mono
  • Use caching ConsoleStream for both iOS and Android #58967
    area-System.Console
  • Relax assert to check for simd8 or return type #58966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create a parent CMake project for building app bundles on CI #58965
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Replacement tokens in logging test baseline files #58963
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix lld support #58959
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Use live-built corehost on s390x for creating testhost #58952
    area-Infrastructure
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • improve Immutable by checking its Count #58928
    area-System.Collections
  • [release/6.0] Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs (#58592) #58926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • fix SendAsync from inpersonificated context with default credentials #58922
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58919
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58917
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging, 6.0.0
  • Fix an issue with ILStripping mscorlib.dll #58934
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Remove unused test libraries in baseservices/threading #58668
    area-System.Threading
  • Add crossgen2 runs for x86 (#58053) #58892
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Resolve overload ambiguities from lambda expression inference change #58953
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • [release/6.0] Enhance CrossGen2 to emit PerfMap debug directory entry #58929
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add perfmap debug directory entry to crossgen2 output as needed #58552
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Coalesce live var ranges right before reporting #58803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix Unix ARM floating point registers unwinding #58915
    area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • #58181 Fix NullReferenceException in crossgen2. #58183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Use separate VNs for DBL2INT_OVF helpers #58931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Consider finally that jumps to itself as non-empty #58881
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add info about .NET 6 compatibility with Intel CET shadow stacks and how to try it #58891
    documentation, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix unloadability issue in AppDomain::FindAssembly #58948
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • JIT: fix VN loop dependence when VN reaches budget limit #58921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix publishing symbols for `dotnet` and `hostpolicy` #58902
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [MonoVM] Report original DLL name when P/Invoke lookup fails #58863
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [release/6.0] Fix an issue with ILStripping mscorlib.dll #58935
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.0
  • Enable more iOS/tvOS device tests #58846
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable global constant propagation for small types #57726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add cast when replacing promoted struct with field in lowering #58589
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Fix race during cancellation of SoundPlayer.Load() due to timeout #58918
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix Type.GetTypeFromHandle nullable annotation #58901
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58694
    area-System.Runtime
  • Throw on unsupported types in src gen #58775
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Remove MonoAssemblyContextKind MONO_ASMCTX_ enum #58802
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Use separate VNs for DBL2INT_OVF helpers #58868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [tasks] [net472] Add ProjectReferences to JsonToItemsTaskFactory #58825
    area-Build-mono
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Address Windows recommendations for Link APIs #58592
    area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • Fix SIMD temp register interference #58914
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Ignore the DuplicateExtension status from macOS 12. #58889
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • documentation for HttpRequestOptions #58896
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • Increment source generator assembly versions with every build #58836
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] fix local build for NetCoreServer and RemoteLoopServer #58900
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Add typeparam docs to interpolated string handler AppendFormatted methods #58875
    area-System.Runtime
  • Add delete operator in Crst class #58885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix setting creation date for OSX-like platforms #49555
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58904
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #58913
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reflection nullability API: improve test coverage, fix bug found #58479
    area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Fix circular dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58905
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58908
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support JsonExtensionData in STJ source-gen #58912
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • [mono] Revive FullAOT test lanes #55362
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Rev Alpine WithNode from 3.9 to 3.13 #57324
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Update libraries helix matrix #58637
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix StackOverflowException in Crossgen2 when assemblies has circular … #58268
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Clear cache after don't stop in a conditional breakpoint #58910
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Multi-target Json and Logger Source Generators between Roslyn v3.9 and v4.0 #58446
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Enhance: BackgroundService blocked the execution of whole host #58851
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Create and publish missing symbols #58866
  • [release/6.0] Skip test suites crashing on CI for iOS/tvOS/MacCatalyst and test fixes for Android #58841
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.0
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Turn on the mobile device telemetry (XHarness workloads) #58864
  • [WIP] [HTTP/3] Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/5.0] Fix ReadOnlySequence created out of sliced Memory owned by MemoryManager #57562
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Memory, 5.0.x
  • Optimize `StringBuilder` by embracing spans and `ISpanFormattable` more. #58907
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono
  • Support unseekable filestream when ReadAllBytes[Async] #58434
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use less calls for MoveDirectory #58869
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add JitStress=1/2 runs to jitstress-isas-x86 pipeline #58822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
